title: Live feed from a flatbed scanner?
content: Would it be possible to write some kind of software that would allow you to see a live feed from the CCD sensor of a flatbed scanner as the mirror moves across the bed? Is there software that exists which can do this? I've had a hard time searching for this, as I'm not even sure how to word this question.

answers_data.content: I doubt it's possible without hacking the firmware since the standard scanner<->host protocols (e.g. TWAIN or WIA) only provide whole images (AFAIK).
